CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 26 reads: "Thousands Thrilled at Courier Home Service Fair...9. The "cool" motif was displayed by the Best Foods Company, makers of Hellmann's Mayonnaise and Nucoa. Shown here are District Supervisor Fred Breininger and pretty Mrs. Mabel Mills...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Fred Breininger and Mabel Mills standing in Hellmann's Mayonnaise booth in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Food industry and trade--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
